title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki

sdumitriu - (00:24): I don't get it...  
sdumitriu - (00:24): I can't release with range dependencies...  
sdumitriu - (00:25): Although it did work once  
sdumitriu - (00:25): When releasing the administration application, it failed once, did a mvn install, then it worked, but now I can't get the blog application to release  
abusenius - (00:28): sdumitriu: what if you use range dependencies in enterprise/wiki/pom.xml instead of applications/\*\*/pom.xml?  
abusenius - (00:29): but maybe its just some maven bug  
sdumitriu - (00:30): Yes, most likely a maven-release-plugin bug  
fmancinelli left at 00:32 (Ping timeout: 276 seconds  
abusenius - (00:33): http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/MRELEASE-318 ?  
sdumitriu - (00:35): Yes
